Package eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.comm

Communication classes through various means: JDBC, JMS, SOAP, FTP, HTTP, etc.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
FileAccess The functions to access files relative to a base directory.
FTPConnection Represents an FTP(s) or an SFTP connection with standard file and directory functions.
 

Class Summary
ChangeNotification<T extends FileAccess> A poll based local or remote file change notifier.
EmailConnection Represents the available functions of an email connection.
EmailPoolManager The email box connection manager.
FileChangeInfo Record to store a FileInfo and a change reason.
FileInfo Record class representing a file or directory on a local or remote (s)FTP(s) site.
FTPPoolManager Manages FTP connection objects.
IMAPEndpoint Testing IMAP(s) connection.
JDBCConnection Wraps a java.sql.Connection and provides some useful methods.
JDBCPoolManager  
JMSConnection An immutable class that wraps the various objects of a JMS based connection: the context, connection, session, queue, etc.
JMSPoolManager Manages connection to a JMS queue.
LocalConnection Class representing the ability to load, save and list files from local directory.
LocalPoolManager A local "connection" manager to allow working with a connection pooling mechanisms.
POP3Endpoint Represents the functions of a POP3 based e-mail account.
POP3Endpoint.POP3Header A POP3 header parser.
SMTPEndpoint An SMTP endpoint.
SOAPConnection Represents a SOAP connection.
SOAPPoolManager A SOAP connection object manager for pool.
WebConnection Represents the functions of a HTTP(s) connection.
WebPoolManager A Web connection manager for pooling.
 

Enum Summary
FileChangeType Enumeration of file change types.
 

Package eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.comm Description

Communication classes through various means: JDBC, JMS, SOAP, FTP, HTTP, etc.
